tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review: I know Dr Geeta for the last three years now. I went to her through a family doctor. She is extremely professional but there is a personal touch too. One will be very comfortable with her..she listens to the patient and accordingly suggest the remedies. I went to get the IVF done. It was successful at the first attempt itself. Today my daughter is 2 years old. I would definitely recommend her to the couples who need proper treatment related to infertility or gynaecology. You wont be dissapointed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Geeta with severe pain and excessive bleeding.. She diagnosed my illness and now I can get out of the pain and depression that I was bearing from so many days..Thank you Doctor for your calm demeanor.. Your kindness and dedication to patients really shine bright in every thing you do.. Thank you so much..

good experience ...satisfied with the doctor consulation..she heard my all the problem whatever i was suffering from.i was suffering from.irregular periods and pain in lower abdrmal.i having medcine from last 1 month.now i am not having same problem but she has adviced me to take the medcine at for 6 month and second consultion will be these montb end.

Dr Geeta Jain is highly professional and experienced. She diagnosed the problem well and has helped with the solution. I am hoping to recover in 3 months as doctor said. She is positive and so I am about it. Even the staff is equally helpful. I recommend this doctor.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: I am really happy and satisfied with the doctor as well with the staff .I am worried a bit before I visit there both the doc and staff are helpful and provide all the things which a new family is looking  they are looking for the happiness of their clients. God bless all the people who are with this hospital.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr Geeta yday for our baby delivery, it was all normal, no CS...labour pain was not so long and delivery was conducted in just half an hour..amazing delivery conduct..so humble , caring and friendly to its patient that it makes them feel just at their home....must must recommended.

Dr Jain is very understanding of her patients. She advises wisely and professionally without imposing any of her wishes on the patient. I underwent a surgery today.  I must say it was performed within no time and the care I received was also mentionable. I would recommend patients to Dr Jain, for as laymen,  we all want perfect professional hands.

Hi I m pawan me nd my wife very happy for select the astha hospital  for iui treatment .it's  very neat or clean all staff r very friendly nature dr mrs geeta jain is too good they understand pasients feeling or problem ... the give good sugiestition to persient me nd my wife very thaks full to doctor we select for conciving the babay in 2nd chance in iui treatment result is positive .... we r very happy . Doctor is god .... the give happiness to paisent or his family ... thanks to all staff of astha hospital or dr Mrs geeta jain

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Geeta Jain is quite friendly and listens to your issues with pateince. She understands the life style needs of today and does not force pateints for any particular treatment or life style change. Rather she understands your problem and guides you in the most comforting and healthiest way possible. One thing that  could be added to the service of the hospital is " Reminder of follow up check ups". For example, if the visit of some pateint is due on some date, that person could be reminded before a day or two.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
